com.ikalagaming.permissions

Class PermissionGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikalagaming.permissions.PermissionGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PermissionHolder

    public class PermissionGroup
extends java.lang.Object
implements PermissionHolder
    A group that can be assigned permissions. Entities that are members of these groups are assigned the permissions of the group, as well as any permissions specific to that entity which may have been assigned.
    Groups may have a parent group which they inherit permissions from. Permissions set in a group override permissions set in a parent group if there are any conflicts.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

      • hasPermission

        public boolean hasPermission(Permission perm)
        Description copied from interface: PermissionHolder
        Gets the value of the specified permission, if set.

        If a the permission is not overridden on this object, the default value of the permission will be returned

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Value of the permission

      • recalculatePermissions

        public void recalculatePermissions()
        Description copied from interface: PermissionHolder
        Recalculates the permissions for this object, if the attachments have changed values.

        This should very rarely need to be called from a plugin.

        Specified by:
        recalculatePermissions in interface PermissionHolder
